summary: Genoa is a major city in Italy and was once a powerful maritime republic. It's known for its large port, which is the busiest in the Mediterranean Sea. The city has a rich history dating back to the Middle Ages, with impressive landmarks and a proud heritage in shipping and trade. Genoa's old town is one of the largest in Europe and is a UNESCO World Heritage Site. It's also home to many important companies and is a key economic center in Italy.
title: Genoa
